content: round 4 work a round of shells two increase shells spaced evenly 20 shells break yarn and join cc2 round 5 work a round of shells two increase shells spaced evenly 22 shells break yarn and join cc3 round 6 work round of shells 22 shells break yarn now divide for leg holes by making a back section and belly strap separately back / shoulders worked across one half in row from fs only rejoin yarn to right side for each row with seam at center back join to space cc4 to right hand side row 7 10 shells 1dc in next space 11 spaces worked 11 spaces unworked break yarn and join cc3 to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 8 3ch skip 2 double_crochet 10 shells break yarn and join cc2 to first space row 9 10 shells 1dc in last st of last shell break yarn and join cc1 to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 10 as row 8 break yarn and join mc to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 11 1dc in each st 31 sts break yarn belly strap worked over a small section of the underside in row from fs only rejoin yarn to right side for each row turn over so ws of back section is facing skip 4 shells 3 spaces and join cc4 yarn to 4th space row 7 4 shells 1dc in next space 5 spaces worked 3 spaces unworked break yarn and join cc3 to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 8 3ch skip 2 double_crochet 4 shells break yarn and join cc2 to first space row 9 4 shells 1dc in last st of last shell break yarn and join cc1 to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 10 as row 8 © 2023 sandra paul 6 of 7 bertie s jumper www cherryheart co uk break yarn and join mc to first double_crochet of 1st shell row 11 1dc in each st 13 sts do not break yarn now re-join with back to complete the leg holes and work the middle section middle with mc yarn still attached to belly strap begin working in the round again round 12 11ch counts as 1dc 8ch skip to back section 1dc in each st across back 8ch skip to belly stcap 1dc in st across belly strap slip_stitch into top of beg 3ch 60 sts round 13 1dc in each st around 60 sts round 14 work double_crochet stitches around increase by 4 evenly 64 sts rounds 15 - 18 work 4 rounds of straight double_crochet 64 sts do not break yarn now start shaping back section and adding length back / length the back section will now begin to curve away from the underside of the belly as length is added to begin a small section of stitches on the underbelly will be left unworked the unworked stitches should line up with the belly strap as closely as possible make slip stitches if needed to get
